name: BG Meyer - Slackers - Short Churchill
additionalNotes:
B.G. Meyer Slackers is the second line released under the Camacho cigars brands which is screenwriter/producer/director Rob Weiss' brand. The BG Meyer Slacker is also part of the Davidoff family as it was developed by master blender, Henke Kelner and made at the Occidental Cigar Factory in the Dominican 
Robb Weiss is part of Camacho's celebrity "Board of the Bold" along withÂ Mike Ditka (Ditka Cigar Line) and Matt Booth (Room 101 Cigars) each of whom have their own cigar brands. The Slacker is a unique blend in the Camacho portfolio as it is the only cigar that provides a portable smoke packaged in a tin. The wrapper is Ecuadorian Connecticut, the binder and three different fillers are from Dominican Republic. The slacker is mild cigar with delicious flavors of buttery, creamy, and hints of sweet notes.
